snippet: Garber, the Major League Soccer commissioner, rebuked Klinsmann, the United States men’s national team coach, for comments that Garber called damaging to the league and to the sport in this country.
abstract: Major League Soccer Commissioner Don Garber criticizes Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of United States men’s national team, in unusually harsh terms for comments that Garber calls damaging to the league and to the sport in the US.
lead_paragraph: Garber, the Major League Soccer commissioner, rebuked Klinsmann, the United States men’s national team coach, for comments that Garber called damaging to the league and to the sport in this country.

headline.main: Don Garber Criticizes Jurgen Klinsmann for Comments About M.L.S.

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
